website_summaries.verdict: A thickly clad copper set that is both attractive and functional – hands down the best available. Users remark that they've never experienced more even cooking, and that they function even better than they look.
pros: Boasts 2.5 millimeters of gorgeous copper layered with polished stainless steel that together delivers precise heat conduction
Both lids and cookware are copper, and the riveted handles are solid cast iron
cons: These 8 pieces are expensive, but they are also beautifully designed and superbly made
If you're willing to invest, this is a great choice

customer_reviews.title: Unsurpassed Copperware
customer_reviews.text: I felt like I was five again at Christmas time opening each boxed Bourgeat piece!! The simplicity, craftsmanship and strength of the cookware is unsurpassed. I studied Mauviel, Ruffoni and Bourgeat for hours. I even bought the Mauviel 2.5mm copper set with bronze handles. I returned them because I prefer the cast iron handless and I really didn't like the large Mauviel stamp. Came across as gawdy. The simplicity and elegance of Bourgeat will enhance any kitchen. Now the cooking begins!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: The highest quality
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best in the world, very heavy duty and very expensive but worth every penny. Your great grand children will be glad that you bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The set came without 11in lid, and poorly packaged. 11 inch brazier was defected.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: I did not receive any owners manual
customer_reviews.text: I am very disapointed that this 8 piece Matfer set did not have an owners care manual. I would like to have this if possible.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: The Best Money Can Buy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cookware, it actually cooks better than it looks. This set offers a nice mix of pots. I still pick up some smaller sauce-pots and use stainless for stockpots. Don't get these too hot, its not necessary when cooking with thick copper (the heat transfer is quick and consistent), Cleaning is not that tough, but polishing is important if you want to retain the look.
customer_reviews.author: W Baskin

customer_reviews.title: None better than Bourgeat
customer_reviews.text: Bourgeat is the very, very best. I also own the 5 piece Mauviel 250c set (and still use it). However Bourgeat is the best. Better than Falk, better than Mauviel. Real professional cooking tools. Improved my cooking in time, quality and taste.Please do not waste your money on any of the 150 series from the other supplier. You also will not appreciate burning your hands with bronze handles. A sole exception - I find the small 8" 150c fry pan useful for saute' of small quantities of mushrooms, bell peppers, shallots for omelettes. It's faster than a 250 for very small amounts of food.
customer_reviews.author: slithy tove

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best set of utensils I ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Hussain Maheryar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, work-of-art cookware
customer_reviews.text: Apart from its functionality, just looking at them brings pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sands

customer_reviews.title: My cooking improved!
customer_reviews.text: Love the set. I've had it just a few weeks, but they are beautiful and heavy! I haven't had any food burn on the sides, the way it does on lighter steel pans. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thapar

customer_reviews.title: Ideal form + function beauty
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I received this set, plus the 11-inch fry pan, as an anniversary gift nearly four years ago. It is a stunning set, solid, beautiful, and reliably responsive in cooking. I never had copper cookware before, and was concerned about the learning curve. Turns out, with this set, at least, there was nothing to worry about. Each and every pan cooks flawlessly every time, looks beautiful whether polished or with patina, and is a breeze to clean. My only regret is that it took me so long in life to discover the joys of cooking with copper.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Hill Roses

customer_reviews.title: They've held up amazingly well and have a beautiful patina. They're definitely pieces that will be in ...
customer_reviews.text: We received this exact set as a wedding gift 12 years ago, and we still use them all the time as our main pots and pans. They've held up amazingly well and have a beautiful patina. They're definitely pieces that will be in our family for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Copper Cookware
customer_reviews.text: Like most buyers, I did my research carefully and landed on this set discounted about 10 years ago. I love it. The stainless steel lining is fabulous and the polished surfaces really do help keep foods from sticking as much as they normally would. The heating response is fabulous. The thick red copper material (the best!) is not only beautiful, but conducts heat so well. If you are looking for a nice set to cover most cooking jobs this is it. I may purchase another sauce pan in the future, but for the most part, this is the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle in Sac

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the finest cookware made. Period. It is very expensive, so I am slowly replacing my old cookware with this, one pot at a time, and it has been worth the wait and the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis D. Valk

customer_reviews.title: Just love this set
customer_reviews.text: Quality pcs great to cook in. Easy to keep polished and looking great too. I previously cooked in calphalon cookware. It was a nice set but this set is superior in heating evenly producing a better end product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn D

customer_reviews.title: Bourgeat 8 piece
customer_reviews.text: The pans are the top of the line. Nothing, repeat nothing can compare to cooking with Bourgeat in copper (they also have steel) I have used them for years. The 4 star downrating is due to the lousy delivery of UPS. Amazon won't offer another vendor. This last order came with a hole in the side of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pans, thickest copper that Ive found.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pans, the best that I have found from my research. Much thicker copper than any other manufacturer, feel nearly as heavy as some cast iron pieces. Will be passing down to my grandkids one day.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur K
